headline: 3 Key Factors That Make AT&T (T) a Top Pick for 2025
summary: AT&T Inc. (NYSE:T) is one of the Best Stocks to Buy for Dividends. In recent years, the company has moved away from non-core businesses such as DirecTV and Time Warner, refocusing on its core operations in wireless and fiber connectivity. This renewed focus allows the company to better meet growing customer expectations for faster and […]
